thread.title: S. African leader's exit is firm, but timeframe is not

title: S. African leader's exit is firm, but timeframe is not
text:
S. African leader's exit is firm, but timeframe is not 8:40pm IST - 02:00 
South Africa's ruling party says scandal-plagued President Jacob Zuma has agreed to resign in principle, but the timeframe for his exit is still being negotiated. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
South Africa's ruling party says scandal-plagued President Jacob Zuma has agreed to resign in principle, but the timeframe for his exit is still being negotiated. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EzY1Pt
